pkgmetadata.longdescription: The outsystems-pipeline Python package provides functions to support the creation of OutSystems CI/CD pipelines using your DevOps automation tool of choice.Visit the `project repository <https://github.com/OutSystems/outsystems-pipeline>`_ on GitHub for instructions on how to build example OutSystems CI/CD pipelines with common DevOps automation tools, as well as documentation that will help you adapt the examples to your particular scenarios.What's new==========**Trigger Manifest Artifact** * New function to create and execute a deployment plan based on the app versions on the manifest given by the latest version of the Trigger Pipeline LifeTime Plugin. * New function to set configuration item values on a target environment based on the values found on the manifest given by the latest version of the Trigger Pipeline LifeTime Plugin.**LifeTime Deployment Operations** * New function to resume the execution of a deployment plan on a target environment where 2-stage deployments are enabled.Installing and upgrading========================Install or upgrade outsystems-pipeline to the latest available version as follows::: pip install -U outsystems-pipeline
